name: Remove Empty Choice
description: Action tag @REMOVE-EMPTY-CHOICE for dropdown list fields that removes the default, empty option, effectively making the first option the default choice. Applies to SQL fields, and is hence useful for selecting a single option returned. The tag is ignored for all other field types, or where the "auto-complete" option is selected.
